code: import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var GetIcon=function GetIcon(props){if(props.species==="Human"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"far fa-user",title:"Humano"});}else if(props.species==="Alien"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fab fa-reddit-alien",title:props.species});}else{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-question",title:props.species});}};var GetIconDead=function GetIconDead(props){if(props.status==="Dead"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"far fa-dizzy",title:"Muerto"});}else if(props.status==="Alive"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fab fa-creative-commons-sampling-plus",title:"Vivo"});}else{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-question",title:"Desconocido"});}};export{GetIcon,GetIconDead};
